thread.title: Online Lenders Rely on Old-School Marketing
thread.title_full: Online Lenders Rely on Old-School Marketing - WSJ

author: Peter Rudegeair
title: Online Lenders Rely on Old-School Marketing
text:
The most unlikely beneficiary of the online-lending boom may be the U.S. Postal Service.
LendingClub Corp., Prosper Marketplace Inc. and other financial technology, or “fintech,” companies are spending hundreds of millions of dollars trying to pry customers away from traditional banks. The main marketing channel for these online upstarts:... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
